proofDetails.en: Building a personal C++ game engine and RPG prototype with custom tooling.
proofDetails.ja: オリジナルの C++ ゲームエンジンと RPG プロトタイプを自作ツールで開発しています。
proofDetails.zh: 用 C++ 自研游戏引擎和 RPG 原型，并编写配套工具链。

roadmapNextStep.en: C++ Game Engine: Continue work on a private game / engine. An abstract loosely-autobiographical RPG adventure.
roadmapNextStep.ja: C++ 製ゲーム／エンジンの継続開発：自伝的要素を取り入れた RPG 体験を目指す。
roadmapNextStep.zh: C++ 游戏引擎：持续开发私人游戏／引擎，目标为带有自传色彩的 RPG 体验。

experienceEntry.summary: Building a personal C++ engine and story-driven RPG prototype, focusing on custom tooling, rendering pipelines, and systems design.
highlights: Implemented core engine loops, asset loading, and input systems with a focus on determinism and debuggability.
Experimented with tooling for narrative scripting and component-based gameplay logic.
